How can I export a raw-file from audacit: Secondly, you can export headerless PCM if you want to, using the Options button in the Export dialogue after setting the file type to "WAV, AIFF and other uncompressed types". Set Format to "Other ..." then Header to "RAW (headerless) and Encoding to "Unsigned 8-bit PCM or "Signed 8-bit PCM" depending on which you need ... (the first problem with headerless data is you don't know what you've got).
